QPTableTextData Class Reference

Provides a table where all of the headers and data are treated as text data. More...

Public Member Functions

 setHeaders ($array)

Detailed Description

Provides a table where all of the headers and data are treated as text data.

This provents marked-up data from being inserted into the DOM as elements. Instead, the text is escaped using {

See also:
htmlentities()}.
